lines.text: ladies, women and cuties. Never mistake a lady for a woman, a woman for a cutie, or a cutie for a lady. Of course, there are ladies who behave like ladies, dress like women, but are cuties! On the other hand, there are cuties, who dress like ladies, but act like - - we'll go into that later.
Well, once upon a time I married a girl because she smelled good.

[On the phone]
Who's him? Eh, he? Who is he? I see, him and he are the same. I think you are a little bit tipsy... It's a very good omen for marriage. I was half-stewed when I proposed to your mother.
This is my father.
Yes, if you don't mind.
I'm glad to meet you, father.
That's the first time I've ever been called father by a strange man.
Now, listen Cornelius, let's make up our minds. Are we going to have a Directors meeting or are you going to crack nuts?
Come on, Dad. We'll put you at the family table for the present.
Oh, am I gonna get a present?

[Toast]
Here's to your liver!
Dad, you know you shouldn't drink cognac.
Hey, I only had four or five. They weren't any bigger than thimbles. All this fuss about a little cognac.
I'm not going to argue with you, not anything works.
What am I - a mad dog or something? Listen, Lia, I resent this very much. Whose your father here? You or me?
Dad, what am I going to do with you?
Take me where there's more cognac.
That idiot brother of mine has no idea what a darling you are! He's never even imagined eyes, cheeks, lips like yours!
He's a great catch. He's rich. He's old. What more do you want?
Don't apologize, my lord. A mistake is a mistake. When I was in Vaudeville, once my assistant handed me a porcupine instead of a rabbit.
I'm sick and tired of ball bearings! I don't care whether the order calls for 5 ball bearings, 7 ball bearings or a bowling alley full of ball bearings.

[At the Lido beach]
Duckie, will you take my shoes off and shake them out.
With pleasure, dear.
Darling, I said only my shoes!
Trixie!
Oh, you freshie!
Now, no more asking Father's permission. Want to give me a kiss?
Please, afterwards.
Well, it's afterwards now!
Oh, wait till we get home.
Wait much longer and I'll explode.
Does that tempt your appetite darling?
Very nice.
Oh, such an agreeable little sugar plum!
And for yourself?
I have no appetite - eh, for eating.
Oysters are excellent for - raising an appetite.
Don't you feel like a little goose?
Yes, but, not so little.
